snow.player

接口 PlayerStateListener

  • 所有超级接口:
    Player.OnBufferedProgressChangeListener, Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener, Player.OnPlayingMusicItemChangeListener, Player.OnPlaylistChangeListener, Player.OnPlayModeChangeListener, Player.OnPositionChangeListener, Player.OnPrepareListener, Player.OnSeekCompleteListener, Player.OnStalledChangeListener

    public interface PlayerStateListener
extends Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener, Player.OnPrepareListener, Player.OnStalledChangeListener, Player.OnBufferedProgressChangeListener, Player.OnPlayingMusicItemChangeListener, Player.OnSeekCompleteListener, Player.OnPositionChangeListener, Player.OnPlaylistChangeListener, Player.OnPlayModeChangeListener

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener

        onError, onPause, onPlay, onStop

        onPrepared, onPreparing
